mapper.insert:
SELECT (CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN CONCAT('pn_', LPAD(1, 2, 0)) WHEN MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pl.point_no, 'pn_', -1) AS UNSIGNED)) > 98 THEN CONCAT('pn_', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pl.point_no, 'pn_', -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) ELSE CONCAT('pn_', LPAD(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pl.point_no, 'pn_', -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1, 2, 0)) END) AS pointNo FROM point_log pl;
INSERT INTO point_log ( point_no, id, point_receive_ymd, point_receive_content, point_receive, point_division ) VALUES ( #{pointNo}, #{id}, CURDATE(), #{prc}, #{pointReceive}, '사용' );

SELECT (CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN CONCAT('psl_', LPAD(1, 2, 0)) WHEN MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pl.psl_no, 'psl_', -1) AS UNSIGNED)) > 98 THEN CONCAT('psl_', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pl.psl_no, 'psl_', -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) ELSE CONCAT('psl_', LPAD(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pl.psl_no, 'psl_', -1) AS UNSIGNED))+1, 2, 0)) END) AS pslNo FROM pointshop_logs pl;
INSERT INTO pointshop_logs ( psl_no, id, ps_cd, psl_used_point, psl_log_ymd ) VALUES ( #{pslNo}, #{id}, #{psCd}, #{usedPoint}, CURDATE() );
